column5: This beautiful one bedroom apartment is in a well-kept area. Enjoy the convenience of being close to everything with easy access to airport, shopping, restaurants, and entertainment. If convenience and location are important factors in your lifestyle, you've come to the right place.  Fully equipped kitchen, vaulted ceilings, walk-in closet, ceiling fans, plush carpeting, and air conditioning, swimming pool with sun deck and beautiful landscaping are just a few of the features included.
